verses.name: Acts 22:7
verses.text: And I fell unto the ground, and heard a voice saying unto me, Saul, Saul, why persecutest thou me?

verses.name: Acts 22:8
verses.text: And I answered, Who art thou, Lord? And he said unto me, I am Jesus of Nazareth, whom thou persecutest.

verses.name: Acts 22:9
verses.text: And they that were with me saw indeed the light, and were afraid; but they heard not the voice of him that spake to me.

verses.name: Acts 22:10
verses.text: And I said, What shall I do, Lord? And the Lord said unto me, Arise, and go into Damascus; and there it shall be told thee of all things which are appointed for thee to do.
